meanings.definition: The quality of being diligent and attentive in one's studies.
meanings.sent1: Her studiousness was evident in the way she always completed her homework on time.
meanings.sent2: His studiousness paid off when he aced the exam.
meanings.sent3: The cat's studiousness in observing the bird outside was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The garden's studiousness in blooming beautifully all year round was impressive.
meanings.sent5: The studiousness of the ant colony in gathering food was truly remarkable.

meanings.definition: The act of being dedicated to learning and acquiring knowledge.
meanings.sent1: The student's studiousness was evident in the way he spent hours in the library.
meanings.sent2: Her studiousness led her to pursue a career in academia.
meanings.sent3: The dog's studiousness in trying to understand human language was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The tree's studiousness in absorbing sunlight for photosynthesis was remarkable.
meanings.sent5: The studiousness of the scientist in conducting experiments was truly inspiring.
